DOC.brief_summary: the purpose of the study is to extend the use of Rasagelin Mesylate 1mg per day by subjects who participated in the Adagio TVP 1012/501 according to form 4a for additional three years.
DOC.brief_title: Continuation Treatment Protocol for Patients Who Participated in the Adagio TVP 1012/501 Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: subjects who are willing to contiue this treatment. subjects who took part in the TVP 1012/501 clinical trail. subjects who didn't take part in the TVP 1012/501 clinical trail.
